channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: How Not to Play Go

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I understand that sentiment. I will have to say that sometimes books can help clarify some of our mistakes we make in our train of thought. But if books aren't helping, maybe having a stronger player review your games will help! Let me know if you want some recommendations for players I think are great.
item.content:encoded: I understand that sentiment. I will have to say that sometimes books can help clarify some of our mistakes we make in our train of thought. But if books aren’t helping, maybe having a stronger player review your games will help! Let me know if you want some recommendations for players I think are great.

item.title: By: Scott
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: This book looks pretty cool. I have seemed to hit a sort of wall. Books, while seemingly increasing my understanding for the game, have not really resulted in me playing stronger.
item.content:encoded: This book looks pretty cool. I have seemed to hit a sort of wall. Books, while seemingly increasing my understanding for the game, have not really resulted in me playing stronger.
